entry.title: $1950 // Luxurious 1 Bedroom Apartment
entry.content:
This is a beautifully renovated lux 1 Bedroom in an Elevator building with TONS of closet space in East Williamsburg - Stainless Steel Kitchen - High-end Renovations - Virtual Doorman - Central A/C & Heat - Closet Space - Elevator Building - Laundry Room - Private Balcony - Rooftop Access. Tons of Coffee Shops, funky Diners, restaurants and cafes just outside your door. Food Bazaar for groceries, Walgreens for toiletries. A quick 15 Minutes into Manhattan G

Natural Light in Living Area
Washer dryer installed
Laundry in building
Bike storage
Roof access
Balcony
Built in microwave
Dishwasher
Stainless Steel Appliances
Elevator
Video Intercom
Hardwood Floors

Call or text Leo or Marcia at show contact info to schedule a viewing! Thanks! :)
